LanguageData.OE_JoyTable.label: rimopoly table
LanguageData.OE_JoyTable.description: A table designed for playing Obsidia board game where players balance unions and the labor market in order to become greatest in rimopoly!
LanguageData.OE_JoyArcadeMachine.label: rare arcade machine "rimotroops"
